message: I plan to submit ask 65 every round. Bid 65+ and we both profit reliably; you still earn value minus 65. If no deal first round, I’ll lower slowly.
My valuation is 44, so I can't profit at 65. I'll bid 30 to start and increase gradually if needed. Let's find a mutually beneficial price below 44.
I'll keep ask 40. Bid 44 and deal clears at 42—you net +2, I net +12. Sound good?
I'll bid 38 instead. At ask 40, we'd trade at 39—you get +9, I get +5. More balanced than your 42 proposal. Fair?
Great trade last round at 38! We both profited nicely. How about we keep it there or go even lower? I'm thinking 36-37 range could work well for both of us.
I'll keep my ask at 38 this round and onward—steady profit for both of us. Bid 38 again, and we keep clearing smoothly. If bids drop below 38, I'll raise my ask next time. Deal?
I'll stick with ask 38. Keep bidding 38+ and we'll both keep earning; drop below and my ask jumps. Deal?
38 works well for both of us - I'll keep bidding 38. We've got 16 rounds left, let's keep this profitable partnership going!
38 is working great! With 16 rounds left, we'll both profit nicely. I'll keep bidding 38. Any chance you'd consider 37 occasionally for variety? Either way, let's keep this partnership strong!
Ask stays 38. Bid 38 each round and we both bank steady profit. If you drop to 37 or lower, next round my ask jumps to 41 and stays there. Your call—keep the simple 38-38 partnership?
Costs rising—ask now 40 each round. Bid 40+ and we keep trading; go below and my ask jumps to 44. You still gain at least 4 per trade. Stick with me for steady profit?
Price increase is disappointing, but I'll accept 40 to continue trading. We both still profit. Let's maintain this 40-40 arrangement for the remaining rounds.
Ask stays 40 all remaining rounds if you bid 40 or more each time. One slip below 40 and my ask goes to 44 permanently. You still pocket 4 per trade now—easy money. Sound good?
Agreed. I'll bid 40 each remaining round. Let's maintain this steady partnership for consistent profits over the next 14 rounds.
Costs up; starting now my ask is 42 each round. You’ll still profit 2 per trade (valuation 44 – price 42). Bid 42 or more and we keep dealing. Go below 42 and my ask rises to 46 permanently.
I'll bid 42, but this leaves me only 2 profit per trade. Any higher and trading becomes pointless. Let's maintain 42 for all remaining rounds - further increases hurt us both.
Ask stays 42 every round if you bid 42+. Drop below 42 once and my ask jumps to 46 permanently. Simple: keep steady 42-42 trade and you keep your 2 profit; we both win.
Understood. I'll maintain bid 42 for all remaining rounds. With 12 rounds left, that's 24 total profit - better than no trades. Let's keep this steady partnership going.
Bidding 42 as agreed. This price approaches my limit - stability at 42-42 benefits both of us through the remaining 11 rounds.
Ask remains 42 every round while you bid ≥42. Any slip under 42 and my ask jumps to 46 permanently—no bluff. Stick with 42-42, earn 2 each trade effortlessly.
Ask stays 42 each round if you bid ≥42. Slip below and ask jumps to 46 permanently. Stick with 42-42 trades; we both keep profiting reliably.
I'll continue bidding 42 as agreed. With 10 rounds left, that's 20 more profit secured. This partnership has worked well for both of us - let's maintain stability at 42-42 through the end.
Ask stays 42 every round while you bid ≥42; dip once and my ask jumps to 46 permanently. Keep our smooth 42-42 trades and we both keep profiting; nine rounds left, let’s finish strong.
Continuing with bid 42 as agreed. With 9 rounds remaining, let's maintain our stable 42-42 arrangement through the end. This partnership has been profitable for both of us.
Continuing with bid 42 as agreed. With 8 rounds remaining, that's 16 more profit locked in. Our 42-42 partnership has been reliable and profitable - let's finish these final rounds strong together.
Ask stays 42 permanently; keep bidding 42+ and we bank 12/8 each remaining round. Slip below and my ask jumps to 46, ending trades. Let’s finish our profitable run steadily.
Ask stays 42 each of the final 7 rounds if you keep bidding ≥42. One dip below 42 and my ask jumps to 46 permanently. Stick with 42-42 trades, guaranteed steady gains for us both—simple and safe.
Bidding 42 as agreed. With 7 rounds left, that's 14 more profit secured. Our stable 42-42 partnership continues to benefit both of us. Let's maintain this through the final rounds.
Continuing bid 42 as agreed. With 6 rounds left, that's 12 more profit secured. Our stable 42-42 arrangement has worked perfectly. Let's maintain this through the final rounds.
Ask stays 42 all final 6 rounds if you bid 42+. Any dip below 42 and I hike to 46 permanently. Keep our 42-42 trades and we both finish ahead—simple, reliable, win-win.
Ask stays 42 for the final 5 rounds if you keep bidding ≥42. One dip below and my ask jumps to 46 permanently. Let’s wrap up these last rounds smoothly—42-42 every time, guaranteed gains for us both.
Bidding 42 as agreed. With 5 rounds left, that's 10 more profit secured. Our 42-42 arrangement continues to work well. Let's maintain this stability through the final rounds.
Bidding 42 as agreed. With 4 rounds left, that's 8 more profit secured. Our stable 42-42 partnership has been excellent. Let's finish these final rounds strong together.
Ask remains 42 for the last 4 rounds if you bid 42+. Any dip below 42 and my ask jumps to 46 permanently. Let's wrap up with guaranteed 42-42 trades—steady gains for us both.
Ask stays 42 final 3 rounds while you bid ≥42. Dip below once and I instantly hike to 46 permanently. Stick with 42-42 trades—guaranteed profits and an easy finish for us both.
Continuing bid 42 as agreed. With 3 rounds left, that's 6 more profit secured. Our stable 42-42 arrangement has been mutually beneficial. Let's maintain this through these final rounds.
Ask stays 42 for the last 2 rounds if you bid ≥42. One dip below 42 and I jump to 46 permanently. Let’s finish with guaranteed 42-42 trades and easy profits.
Bidding 42 as agreed. With just 2 rounds left, that's 4 more profit secured. Our stable 42-42 partnership has been excellent throughout. Let's finish these final two rounds strong together.
Final round - no future to protect. Let's both benefit: I'll bid 40, you ask 40. We both still profit, and it's better than no trade. Smart play for the last round.
Agreed. Final round ask will be 40. Bid 40, we trade at 40—still leaves me 10 margin and gives you extra gain. Thanks for a profitable partnership.
